observation: Continuous innovation in Irish Forestry Investment - Irish Forestry Funds  Twitter Facebook Search Menu Home Company Profile Company Directors Contact Us Financial Statments Irish Forestry Funds Forestry Growth Plans Online Forms The offices of the Irish Forestry Funds will remain closed in line with HSE guidelines. Email received at shareholderquery@irish-forestry.ie Important Notice The Following companies are now in Members Voluntary Liquidation and cheque distributions were sent to all Preference shareholders on 16th August 2019. All queries in relation to the companies listed below should be addressed in writing to: Alan Fitzpatrick & Co Alan Fitzpatrick has been appointed as the Liquidator to the following companies all of which are in Members Voluntary Liquidation: The Second Irish Forestry Fund Plc Latest Financial statements Forestry Fund Company Click for The First Forestry Growth Plan Fund The Second Forestry Growth Plan Plc Veon Vision Investors see the wood for the trees with environmental benefits Latest news Press Coverage Image Library FAQ’s Shares for Sale The directors of the Irish Forestry Funds are please to announce that they have accepted an offer from AXA Investment Managers for the entire portfolio of the Irish Forestry Funds on behalf of their 12,400 shareholders.  This transaction is the largest private sale of forestry by value in Irish history and Gresham House Asset Management has been appointed by AXA Investment Managers – Real Assets as the exclusive asset manager. This is a very positive development for our shareholders, with the portfolio’s value and returns serving as a strong endorsement of the Irish forestry and timber sector. Veon looks forward to playing our part in continuing to grow the national forest estate and helping to further develop the forest industry, which is of critical importance in combatting the effects of climate change. The portfolio was independently advised by Deloitte and marketed in a competitive tender process.  Legal transaction support was provided by Lacy Walsh solicitors and Eversheds Sutherland. Subscribe to our You Tube channel, click below Copyright © 2015 Irish Forestry Funds. All Rights Reserved. Privacy Notice We use cookies to ensure that we give you the best experience on our website. If you continue to use this site we will assume that you are happy with it. Ok Read more Scroll to top
